summary: This bill addresses the issue of "Misbehaving Content Scrapers." The text indicates a requirement to use robots.txt and notes that the scraper's IP address has been rate-limited. It directs the scraper to use the GPO.gov Bulk Data Download service (https://www.gpo.gov/fdsys/bulkdata/) as an alternative way to access the desired data. The primary focus is likely on regulating data access and preventing abusive scraping practices or unauthorized bulk data acquisition. The context suggests concerns about data access methods and their regulation.
